company: Ehrenberg-Bass Institute - The University of South Australia
description: Responsible for extracting and storing data in Snowflake using Python, performing extensive data cleaning and optimization, developing a user-friendly chatbot with Python and React, and creating an interactive application for consumer buying behavior analysis using Streamlit.
Developing and publishing Android applications on Google Play Store.
Analyzed user requirements and developed a smartphone 'Mapping' application using Java, ensuring proper performance through testing, debugging, and maintenance.

Led the development of a medicine management system for Oslo's health sector in Norway, utilizing JSF, Seam, EJB3, and mySQL, while ensuring its reliability through rigorous testing, debugging, and ongoing maintenance.

Developed sales management systems for Houken Corp with ASP.NET 2.0, VB.NET, and Oracle, management systems for Nikko Corp utilizing Struts, JSP, and Hibernate, and an appointment/dismissal system for Energia Communications' EE-Box project using Struts, JSP, and Oracle. Conducted thorough testing, debugging, and maintenance of all systems.
